title: Who's your favorite support, and why?
body: Personally, I really enjoy {{champion:78}} when I go {{champion:268}} APC since she can get really tanky and I can just attack from a distance. She has great engage also, and make it into an aggressive kill lane despite my bad early game.

replies.body:
Malzahar because it makes a point for how badly Riot screwed up with nerfing him and his voidlings. 

Favorite support that I actually play support is Bard, because Bard.

{{champion:89}} 
I can still make plays even while my ADC is eating crayons in the corner with their helmets on.
{{champion:432}} I like to choose who i support and how. This guy lets me.

I don't play much support, but when I have I played {{champion:111}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:99}}, and {{champion:48}} .  I did the best with {{champion:48}} although I think it was because my ADC wasn't aggressive enough or couldn't anticipate the kill.  Overall, I love Thresh or Leona on my team, a lot of damage for the amount of tankiness they have.

{{champion:266}} 

People have such low expectations for me, I have zero pressure because people expect me to single handedly lose the game anyway.

{{champion:201}} 

His Q and passive just _feel_ like they deal so much damage, whether they do or not.

{{champion:89}} 

A good engage with good follow up will win games no matter how far behind you are. A good engage with bad follow up might still win you games.

A poor engage will never win you games. If you want to be active as a Support other than just warding, you'd want to be able to help your team capitalize on opportunities. Other supports, even Braum, I feel are too focused on being reactive and mitigating what the enemy directly does to your team.

Besides, Leona is a good girl ;)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h1S-ubiF6Dk

Favorite support to play is Bard. I love being able to roam quickly and impact the map.

Favorite support to play with is Janna. I main ADC and I love having Janna. She keeps the area around me safe so I can do my job.

{{champion:17}}

Blind annoys ADC's and protects mine.
E stacks quite nicely with {{item:3098}}.
Mushrooms grant more vision and prevent ganks. Also means he can use other items later.
W helps with harass and poke with Q.
45% CDR Teemo Mushrooms are a nightmare for the enemy.
45% CDR Blind is annoying to the adc.

Other than that...

{{champion:34}} because her icon is light blue. /sarcasm

If people whine, I usually go {{champion:16}} or {{champion:89}}.
